extendedInfo.description: If you need to discover new games, this application is what you are looking for. You will be delighted with what Fobito offers you daily. You can follow which games your friends play and the games they set up in their mobile phones. You can meet new friends and have a chance to share your games. Besides, are you not curious about which games your friends have in their mobile phones? You can follow the games that Fobito members play! The games in the application have already been divided into groups such as car games, football games, strategic games, basketball games and kidsâ games. There are many free games that you can play and you have also a chance to play paid games. Fobito allows you to play all of your games in a single place and you can also delete the games from this site. You can send a post to the wall of the games and follow the other comments related to the game. You can like the updates of your friends and comment on them. Fobito will provide the best and popular games throughout the world.-Discover new games!-Follow the games that your friends play-Organize your games from a single place-Meet new friends

reviews.title: Very nice app to find best games
reviews.comment: It shows me all the recently popular games. Just bloody love it!
